definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
variant of 信口開河|信口开河[xin4 kou3 kai1 he2]

sentences.english: Opening and closing of these three knives is accomplished by a thumb stud.
sentences.chinese: 开合这三把刀可以用拇指柱来完成。

sentences.english: Since mediaeval times, velar and guttural and its opening closing mouth have had many transformations.
sentences.chinese: 中古以来牙喉音及其开合口发生了许多变化。

sentences.english: The invention relates to an auto on-off loose-leaf wind power machine which can gather energy to increase the speed.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种聚能增速自动开合活叶式风力机。

sentences.english: And to her it seemed that the angle of his jaw had changed; its pitch had become unpleasantly aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 在她眼里他那下腭已棱角毕露，开合时咄咄逼人。

sentences.english: My old artificial hand had a pretty basic open-close mechanism similar to a clamp.
sentences.chinese: 我的旧人工手有一个基本的开合机构，如同一个夹子。

sentences.english: Open-system equipment using digital input automatic adjustment function.
sentences.chinese: 设备的开合系统采用数字输入自动调节功能。

sentences.english: Healthy valves open and close in coordination with the pumping action of your heart's atria and ventricles.
sentences.chinese: 健康瓣膜的开合会严密配合心房与心室的泵血动作。

sentences.english: " Another way of referencing the situation is to say that a woman is "losing patency.
sentences.chinese: 还有一种说法叫做妇女正在失去开合度。

sentences.english: Trunnion bascule bridges are doubtless one of the renowned bridge types in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 耳轴开合桥是芝加哥最出名的桥的种类之一。

sentences.english: It is essential that all press fasteners for each garment are opened and closed to test their function.
sentences.chinese: 每一件衣服上所有的按扣都必需经过开合功能测试。

sentences.english: Of cupboard door close, what performing empty and fact alternately is Thespian.
sentences.chinese: 柜门的开合，交替上演着虚与实的戏剧。

sentences.english: Ups and downs of leisure vertical direction in the plane with no open cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 休闲的起落在平面的垂直方向上没有开合作用。

sentences.english: Wang Mei opens and closes the diamond as she counts.
sentences.chinese: 王梅一边数数，一边开合“宝石建议。”

sentences.english: The more complex movable ways are, the greater probability of collision happens.
sentences.chinese: 开合移动方式越复杂，碰撞事故概率越大。

sentences.english: The fixing of female and male head brings with stable self-locking mechanism, separating and combining smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 公母头的固定带有稳定的自锁机构，开合自如。

sentences.english: This telescopic umbrella has 8 ribs, the auto release/close button is fitted into the handle.
sentences.chinese: 这种折叠伞伞架有8根，开合伞的按钮在伞柄中。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
(of uneven surfaces) to fit together/(of gear wheels) to mesh/(dentistry) occlusion/bite
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to close by coming together (like the lips of a wound, the doors of an elevator, the walls of a channel)/to close by connecting in a loop (like a circuit)/closed-loop
door/the opening panel of a door
to take in and send out (in large quantities)
